'''16w35a''' is the fourth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.11]], released on September 1, 2016.<ref name="blogpost_16w35a">https://www.mojang.com/2016/09/minecraft-snapshot-16w35a/</ref>

== Additions ==
'''[[Crowdin|Internationalization]]'''
* New strings within the game were made available for internationalization:
** {{cmd|save-all flush}} command output

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
==== General ====
* Blocks with custom names, including [[banner]]s, [[hopper]]s, [[chest]]s, [[furnace]]s, [[enchanting table]]s, [[dispenser]]s, [[dropper]]s, [[brewing stand]]s, and [[minecart]]s, retain their custom name when the block is dropped as an item, and when the item is placed again.
** Use the <code>CustomName</code> tag

[[File:White Carpet JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Carpet]]s'''
* 1 carpet now smelts 0.335 items, increased from 0.33.
** 3 carpets can now fully smelt 1 item.

[[File:Ladder (S) JE2 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Ladder]]s'''
* 1 ladders now smelts 1.5 items, increased from 1.165.
** 2 ladders can now fully smelt 3 items.

[[File:Oak Trapdoor (D) JE3.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Trapdoor]]s'''
* If placed right next to redstone sources, they now update to an open state.

=== Mobs ===
[[File:Blaze (pre-texture update).gif|width=50x50]] '''[[Blaze]]s'''
* Take {{hp|1}} damage when hit by a [[splash water bottle]].

[[File:Enderman JE2.png|width=65x65]] '''[[Enderman]]'''
* Take {{hp|1}} damage and teleport when hit by a splash water bottle.

[[File:Saddled Pig JE2.png|width=46x46]] '''Saddled [[Pig]]s'''
* Are now able to be renamed by [[name tag]]s.

[[File:Ender Dragon.gif|width=65x65]] '''[[Ender Dragon|Ender Dragons]]'''
* Now shows their hitbox when {{key|F3+B}} is activated.

=== World generation ===
{{Animate|Village Desert Well.png;Village Well.png|64px}} '''[[Village#Desert|Desert]] and [[Village#Savanna|Savanna Village]] wells'''
* The bottom most part of the wells are now made of [[sandstone]] and [[Log#Acacia|acacia logs]] instead of [[cobblestone]] respectively.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Changed the title and description of "Snooper Settings"
** Brings it into line with the new privacy policy<ref name="new_privacy_policy">https://www.mojang.com/2016/09/weve-just-updated-our-privacy-policy/</ref>
** Title is now "Feed us data!" instead of "Machine Specs Collection"
** Description is now "We always want to improve Minecraft and, to help us do that, we'd like to collect some information. This lets us know what hardware to support and where the big problems are. It also gives us a sense of the size of our active player base, so we know if we're doing a good job. You can view all the information we collect below. If you want to opt out then you can simply toggle it off!"

[[File:Shield JE1.png|width=43x43]] '''[[Shield]]s'''
* Now block 100% of the damage dealt in melee combat, up from 66%.
** [[Zombie]]s without any [[weapon]]s don't deal any damage to the player, nor damage the shield's durability.
** [[Creeper]] explosions deal 0 damage to the player.
** [[Wither skeleton]]s don't inflict the [[Wither (effect)|Wither]] effect when hit by them.
** Burning zombies don't set the player on fire.
** [[Husk]]s don't apply the [[Hunger (effect)|Hunger]] effect.
** [[Stray]]s don't apply the [[Slowness]] effect.
* Now are disabled 100% of the time if a mob or player wielding an [[axe]] attacks the player when the shield is blocking, even if they are not sprinting.{{Verify}}
